instruction: Read the following passage and find the wrong statements.
input: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. It is considered one of the Big Four technology companies, alongside Amazon, Google, and Facebook.
output:
The wrong statements are:
1. Apple Inc. is headquartered in Cupertino, California
2. Apple Inc. sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services
3. Apple Inc. is considered one of the Big Four technology companies, alongside Amazon, Google, and Facebook.
